title: Service Agreement and Privacy Policy
message: Please carefully read and fully understand the terms of Service Agreement and Privacy Policy, and then click one of the below buttons to accept or reject the terms and services.

messageLocales.en: Please carefully read and fully understand the terms of Service Agreement and Privacy Policy, and then click one of the below buttons to accept or reject the terms and services.
messageLocales.zh-Hans: 请您审慎阅读、充分理解《服务协议和隐私政策》各条款，然后点击以下按钮之一以接受或拒绝这些条款和服务。
messageLocales.zh-Hant: 請您審慎閱讀、充分理解《服務協議和隱私政策》各條款，然後點擊以下按鈕之壹以接受或拒絕這些條款和服務。

second.title: Exit the App
second.message: Because you rejected Service Agreement and Privacy Policy, the app is going exit, please click one of the below buttons to change or confirm your choice.

messageLocales.en: Because you rejected Service Agreement and Privacy Policy, the app is going exit, please click one of the below buttons to change or confirm your choice.
messageLocales.zh-Hans: 尊敬的用户，由于您拒绝了《服务协议和隐私政策》，现在即将退出应用，请点击以下按钮之一以修改或确认您的意向。
messageLocales.zh-Hant: 尊敬的用戶，由于您拒絕了《服務協議和隱私政策》，現在即將退出應用，請點擊以下按鈕之壹以修改或確認您的意向。
